name: vibes.diy-monorepo
description: it contains all elements of vibes.diy web page

scripts.lint: eslint . && cd hosting/pkg && pnpm lint && cd ../../vibesbox/pkg && pnpm lint && cd ../tests/unit && pnpm lint
scripts.test:all: cd vibes.diy/tests/app && pnpm run test && cd ../simple-chat && pnpm run test && cd ../../../prompts/tests && pnpm run test && cd ../../use-vibes/tests && pnpm run test && cd ../../call-ai/tests && pnpm run test
scripts.hosting:check: echo '🔍 Running hosting CI checks...' && pnpm --filter @vibes.diy/hosting-base build && echo '✅ Hosting base built' && cd hosting/pkg && pnpm check && echo '✅ Hosting format and lint passed' && cd ../.. && pnpm --filter @vibes.diy/hosting-tests test && echo '🎉 All hosting CI checks passed!'
scripts.vibesbox:check: echo '🔍 Running vibesbox CI checks...' && cd vibesbox/pkg && pnpm check && echo '✅ Vibesbox format and lint passed' && cd .. && pnpm --filter @vibes.diy/vibesbox-tests test && echo '🎉 All vibesbox CI checks passed!'
scripts.check: pnpm format && pnpm build && pnpm lint && pnpm test
scripts.storybook: cd vibes.diy/pkg && cross-env DISABLE_REACT_ROUTER=true pnpm run storybook
